response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This extraordinary item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to enhance their operations or personal endeavors. I understand that the true value of this product might be subjective and deeply personal to you, which is why I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a significant discount compared to its market value, aiming to make this opportunity more accessible to you while still allowing us to recognize its true worth. I believe this product could revolutionize the way you approach your work or hobbies, and I am confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or arrange a viewing of the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
